========================
Ella imports application
========================

Imports data from both remote servers and other local Ella-based sites.


Features
========

- Can import data from remote sources: RSS, RSS2, Atom formated XMLs.
- Imports data from other sites, that are in the same Ella instance.
- Downloads attached images and saves them to local static file repository

Data models
===========

- Server: Source server configuration and type
- ServerItem: Specific item to be imported
